column4: Hi... I'm new to Ubuntu... I have downloaded a program in the form of tag.gz and extracted it... how do I make and makeinstall?
you may want to look VERY hard for a prebuildt package  - compiling from source will take a bit of learning.
I tried looking in synaptic, it's not there... besides, I want to learn
it is in there.. check the spelling.
best thing you can do with xmms. is learn to use an alternaive program
depends on what you are playing. I tend to use bmpx
I want something minimal... these other programs with extensive "libraries" and needless features turn me off
whats the actual 'needs' however.. :)   you just described what you dident want. (in vague terms) :)
